name: Fullstack Academy, Inc.
description: Operator of a software development school. The company offers curriculum courses on Web technologies such as Node.js/Express, JavaScript, MongoDB, AngularJS, HTML5 and CSS3 for students to become a software engineer.
one_liner: Operator of a software development school. The company offers curriculum courses on Web technologies such as Node.js/Express, JavaScript, MongoDB, AngularJS, HTML5 and CSS3 for students to become a software engineer.
